topic.title: BENEFIT RECEIPT INDICATOR FOR IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the PATIENT is currently in receipt of Jobseeker's Allowance, Employment and Support Allowance, Universal Credit or Personal Independence Payment for the purpose of the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set, as stated by the PATIENT.
